plot: Set in Berlin, the film is an inside look at the life of an illegal immigrant from Vietnam who must sell cigarettes on the black market in order to survive.
title: Berliner Osten
plot_es: Set in Berlin, the film is an inside look at the life of an illegal immigrant from Vietnam who must sell cigarettes on the black market in order to survive.
plot_en: Set in Berlin, the film is an inside look at the life of an illegal immigrant from Vietnam who must sell cigarettes on the black market in order to survive.
